qas.question: What year was the Football World Cup Final in Bern?
What football team is based in Bern?

context: Bern was the site of the <a0_0>1954<a0_0/> Football (Soccer) World Cup Final, a huge upset for the Hungarian Golden Team, who were beaten 3–2 by <a1_0>West Germany<a1_0/>. The football team <a2_0>BSC Young Boys<a2_0/> is based in Bern at the Stade de Suisse Wankdorf, which also was one of the venues for the European football championship 2008 in which it hosted 3 matches.
